page.title: 10Religious Worship in Weston
page.content:
The{Anglican Church}belongs to the United Benefice of Kirtlington, Weston Bletchingdon and Hampton Gay. Some 15 to 20 people attend Weekly{Communion at 9.15 am. Family Communion held each month at 11.00 am is better attended A keen team of{bellringers}ring rounds for services and festivals (including May Day celebrations). A youth group for the recently confirmed is planned.
The{Methodist Chapel}belongs to the Bicester Circuit. It has a membership of 14, mainly older people. Services are held weekly at 3.00 pm, moving to 6.00 pm for festival services.
{Roman Catholics, Quakers}and others attend services in Oxford or Bicester.
A non-denominational{Sunday School}is held weekly in the Village Hall.
